p: HEK 293T cells (human embryonic kidney cells, female) were maintained in DMEM medium supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), and 100 U mL -1 of Penicillin-Streptomycin. MDCK cells (Madin-Darby canine kidney cells, female) were maintained in MEM medium supplemented with 10% FBS, 2 mM L-Glutamine, and 100 U mL -1 of Penicillin-Streptomycin. MDCK-SIAT1 cells (Madin-Darby canine kidney cells with stable expression of human 2,6-sialyltransferase, female) were maintained in MEM medium supplemented with 10% FBS, 2 mM L-Glutamine, 100 U mL -1 of Penicillin-Streptomycin, and 1 mg mL -1 G418 sulfate.
